name: Ring Runner (Escada Games)
description:
Made for the Trijam 215, final time was 2:53:13. The theme was "Get back in the ring!".

 Right now I'm really rusty on game development... So, I tried making something quite simple and short at first.

Credits

Fonts used  are here: Nimble Beasts Collective. Palette used was the Lemon-Lime.

Software used:

  • Godot Engine v3.5 Stable;
  • LibreSprite v1.0-dev;
  • LabChirp v1.60;
  • Screen To Gif 2.31;
  • GIMP v2.10.32.
